branchCategory.name: AV2000/3000/4000/5000 Series, Soft Start-up Valve
branchCategory.description: <p>Series AV soft start-up valves allow the user to set the initial rate of system pressurization to minimize system shock.  When deactivated, the valve quickly exhausts the system for safe servicing of equipment.</p>
